group.name: home
group.string: [Google Automatic Translation - Replace Before Release] I experienced a variety of techniques to fill my need to create pottery, stained glass, screen printing, batik, encaustic, Japanese papers, creative process, color theory, digital photography, computer graphics, multimedia, film, etc.

[Google Automatic Translation - Replace Before Release] My commitment to abstract painting was consolidated when I attended the Workshop gesture in Montreal in 2007. It taught me to appreciate a work there, even if it is only in fine detail.
